title: Training guidelines and competencies for serious mental illness (SMI) psychology.

abstract: Individuals with serious mental illness (SMI) face unique and significant challenges that require evidence-based practices and clinicians who have advanced, comprehensive training to provide them. SMI affects about 5.5% of the US population …
